text: [I'm really curious about the earliest adaptations.] Professor, can you tell me about the first Alice in Wonderland film?
[That's so early in film history!] Wow, 1903! That's incredible. How did they manage the special effects for Alice's size changes?
[I'm fascinated by the progression of these adaptations.] What about later adaptations? When did we see the first full-length Alice film?
[I wonder about the transition to sound.] And the first 'talkie' version? When did that happen?
[Disney's version must have been a big milestone.] What about the famous Disney animated version? When was that released?
[I'm curious about more recent interpretations.] Have there been any interesting modern takes on Alice?
